body.name: Bfonder Kitchen Knife Set with Block, 11PCS Chef Knife Set with Sharpener, Japanese Stainless Steel Knife Block Set for Kitchen with Acrylic Stand, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 23 mins
features: 【All-in-one 11pcs Kitchen Knife Set】The knife set includes the following knives. 8″ chef’s knife, 8″ slicing knife, 8″ bread knife, 5″ serrated utility/tomato knife, 3″ curved paring knife, 6.5″ Japanese santoku knife, 4″ fish knife, a multifunction clip, a block brush, a sharpener and a 8 slot storage block. All of the knives perform most cutting, chopping, slicing, deboning, and carving tasks.

【Comfortable to Grip and Easy to Control】Bfonder Knives Set for Kitchen in our set feels like an extension of your hand. They are heavily weighted toward the butt of the handle, which makes rock chopping feel a lot more natural. we went to great pains to make sure this block knife set is well balanced and easy to maintain.

【Sharpness and Steadiness Make the Art of Cooking】Our chef knife set is made of precisely tempered high carbon stainless steel, has great hardness, high wear, corrosion resistance, and its extremely easy to sharpen. Whether you’re prepping for dinner, grabbing a snack or carving a roast, you’ll get a high quality Kitchen knives set to get the job done quickly and neatly.

【Asian Knives with Modern Design】Kitchen Knife Set Designed to prep delicate foods like fish and tender vegetables with an up and down motion, our stainless steel knives are lighter and thinner and have blades with less of an angle. While this helps them to make precise cuts, it also means our chef knife set with sharpener have to be handled more carefully and shouldn’t be used for tasks like cutting up butternut squash or through bones.

【Prompt Customer-oriented Service】Bfonder kitchen knife set with acrylic stand and beautiful package. Suitable as a wedding, birthday, housewarming and holiday gift for your friends and family. We sincerely appreciate your trust in our brand. We are always here and ready to provide heart to heart service for you. Just feel free to contact Bfonder if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Long-lasting Sharp 2 Black Oxide Coating 3 Comfortable to Grip

How to care for knives to avoid rusting? 1.Do not wash your knives in the dishwasher. 2.Wash your knives with dish soap after each use and dry them off. 3.Need to apply oil to the surface of the tool when it is not used for a long time. How to properly use the sharpening stone? Only pull backwards when sharpening, it is forbidden to push and pull repeatedly, which will damage the blade. Too frequent sharpening will reduce the life of knife！ Notice："Coarse" is for sharpening very dull knives, "Fine" is for daily sharpening. What is the after-sales with kitchen knife set? We provide a one-year free after-sales. If you have any issues with the knife during this period, just feel free to check us. Bfonder has always been providing customer-centric service and listening to our customers’ voice. Why can't put the chef knife set in the dishwasher? For long-term use, we do not suggest you put the knives in the dishwasher because it'll make the blades wear faster. Considering durability and maintenance of the knife set, we strongly recommend you to wash it by hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife set at a great value!
reviews.reviewText: I love this knife set! Every kitchen needs this set! I love the holder as well and it’s nice and thin so it fits in small spaces! The knives are so sharp and work well when cutting vegetables, meat, bread, etc. I would definitely recommend this set to anyone looking to upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving them so far
reviews.reviewText: They are very nice looking and sharp the multi tool it has works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great knives, better set I have ordered off of Amazon. I like that it doesn’t take up a lot of space and that the knives are very sharp. Would recommended to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice set. I just wish it didn't have to touch the counter at the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smooth like butta
reviews.reviewText: Ok, after seeing other reviews I have been waiting to find a reason. But, I have to say, so far, so good. These bad boys are sharp as hell. Just like I want them to be. They glide thru what ever it is I’m cutting. Nice handle and design. The hammered steel look is pretty nice added looks. They are a bit off balance and a couple of knives are bent along the length toward the right. The don’t look that far off but you can see it and tell when you are dicing food. We will see if I return them for that.Overall, I’d giving them a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, only thing better would be dishwasher safe
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing if you hand wash and dry them after each use. Previous reviews who didn't do this started to get rust spots. Amazing knives. The only thing that would make them better is if they were dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: These are super sharp out of the box. Cuts nice. We will see how long they stay sharp. Won't be dissapointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and a lot of variety!
reviews.reviewText: This knife set is worth the bargain! It is so easy to set up the stand, which looks beautiful in my kitchen. After that, the knives just slide right in and are ready to use! It even comes with a sharpener and a little cleaner brush as well! I used a lot of the knife options the day I got the set to make a dinner for my family and it was so easy to do everything I needed with all the options of knives I had. My mom loved the set so much it’s in her Amazon cart right now! Such a great housewarming gift, bridal shower or even just to treat yourself!
